my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Maintenance and inspections to be carried out in accordance with the Manufacturer's Manual and Company MPM system.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Unsafe release of the free-fall lifeboat

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Particular attention should be made to the safe working load of the lifting bridle during launch / recovery of the free-fall lifeboat.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Equipment failure i.e. lifting wires, hooks

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Training / drills involving the launch / recovery of the free-fall lifeboat is suspended with regard to the safety of the crew, until the weather improves.
